directions: Mix water, chickpea flour, rice flour, nutritional yeast, and flax seeds in a saucepan until dissolved. Add oil, onion, and garlic.
Place saucepan over low heat; cook and stir until mixture is the consistency of melted cheese, about 10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups water, or more as needed
title: The World's Best Vegan Melted Cheese
